name: Aviator-Md By Suhail Tech Info
description:
A Whatsapp bot built in NodeJs to make experience better
	 if Any Problem : www.youtube.com/SuhailTechInfo

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot view your Statuses.

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in Console.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Take it 'true' if you wanna show Always Onlline

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

MONGODB_URI.description: Replace it, If you have your own Mongodb key. Its a secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

AUTO_REACTION.description:
Set it `true` If You Wants To Reacts emoji to all commands. 
 And Set it `all` is You Wants to React Emojies to All Messages
